body.name: WLIVE 16 Drawers Dresser, Tall Dresser for Bedroom, Closet, Hallway, Storage Dresser Organizer unit, Large Dressers & Chests of Drawers with Fabric Bins, Charcoal Black Wood Grain Print
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs 49 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐢𝐨𝐮𝐬 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐞 & 𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐞 𝐒𝐚𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧: This 16-drawer tall dresser not only has a space-saving design but also has 16 foldable deep fabric drawers to provide plenty of storage space. The chest of drawers offers drawers of 3 different sizes for you to classify storage clothes, pants, socks, toys, books, thin blankets, and other items.

𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐟𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐃𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐫 𝐎𝐫𝐠𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐫: The modern dresser is ideal for a wide variety of rooms, making storage drawers the perfect complement to any contemporary decor - living room, bedroom, entryway, and more. The waterproof wooden top can hold various daily necessities, such as table lamps, clocks, photos, and other decorations. The fabric dresser for your home offers endless organizational possibilities.

𝐒𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐝𝐲 & 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞: The sturdy steel frame of this drawer dresser is designed on the back with the double "X" shaped support bars to upgrade the structural stability. On this basis, we also added an additional support leg and anti-tip kit for the large dresser to enhance stability.

𝐃𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐮𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: This drawer organizer is made of a strong steel frame, a durable water-resistant wooden top, and breathable non-woven synthetic fabric drawers, which offer stable support and ensure years of use. It features 5 adjustable feet that not only can protect your floor from scratches but also are designed for uneven ground.
𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐀𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐦𝐛𝐥𝐲: The storage organizer unit measures 39.37"L x 11.73"W x 58.19"H. It comes with detailed instructions and all hardware needed for installation, you can assemble it within 30 minutes.
𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐒𝐞𝐫𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞𝐬: If you need any help with this 16-drawer dresser, feel free to contact us and we will get back to you within 24 hours. Your satisfaction is always our top priority.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The future of furniture, no more bulky heavy wood
reviews.reviewText: These fabric dressers are the future of furniture and signify the end of deforestation on out planet. They look like all of the various grains of wood, marble and colorful ones are on the horizon, i purchased the BOHO version as you can see. They are extremely easy to assemble and heavy-duty, yet, lightweight to move around the house. When you relocate to a new city or State, The days of requiring heavy-duty moving dollies are a thing of the past! No worrying about the movers scratching up your furniture and making them weak and squeak by being moved. Now, the smaller units like this one, are really short! They are using trick photography here. Lol. So, if you want a dresser that's waste high or lower , you need to order a taller unit. This furniture can accommodate vases, tvs, artwork, etc, as the top is real solid wood. These units come with all the tools and screws for assembly, primarily a hex wrench key, which is more time consuming because they are a pain to turn and get in. Not a major flaw, just a inconvenience in a arthritis sort of way! Lol I urge the reader to get a dremel and use the cutting tool to cut off the top of the wrench provided, this way, you can put it in a power drill as I did, which speeds up assembly greatly. I hope the manufacturer is reading this review and find a way to include a straight Allen key, it will increase sells.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together, saves space
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for our boys room. With lots of room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty cool dresser
reviews.reviewText: This dresser was easy to put together they give you a instructions, they give you tools, also extra parts. Looks nice. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this dresser. I like to change decor every couple of years so this is a less expensive way to justify doing so. Easy to build, sturdy. Husband was skeptical that it wasn’t traditional wooden dresser but was pleasantly surprised after seeing finished product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars I am missing a part needed to finish assembling it. Please help.
reviews.reviewText: I am almost done setting it up, but I am missing one more rectangular flat cardboard piece that is used in the bottom of each drawer to maintain its structure. All of the other drawers are completed except for this one. It is for one of the larger bottom drawers. I really just need one more piece to finish setting it up because I currently cannot use this one drawer until I have the flat black piece to keep its shape. Please help me and I will gladly update my rating and review, because it otherwise seems like a really nice dresser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely in love!
reviews.reviewText: I’m so in love with this dresser , I thought I would like it but Im pleasantly surprised. It took me about a hour to be build by myself but if you’ve never build something before if might take you a little bit longer but the directions are pretty straightforward. All I gotta say is be careful with the screws, they can easily be stripped. Other than the stripped screws, it was well packaged and I love the look. My place is pretty small so this fits perfectly, all my clothes were in gray totes from moving and all transferred to this dresser. I also love the fact that there’s adjustable feet because my floor is super uneven!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I wasn’t sure about the quality but is actually not bad, takes a bit to assemble but it not hard, the drawers really look like they are made out of wood, no one can tell they aren’t. And is actually big. Is a little light but one you put stuff inside it gets heavier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not well prepared for construction
reviews.reviewText: Several places where screws are placed are missing the threading for the screw to be secured into. Luckily, still holds together “well enough”. Definitely temporary furniture. No long term expectations.
